Locations.Name: Graveyard Entrance
Locations.InitialDescription: The archway to enter the graveyard rests behind you
Locations.Description: You are standing at the graveyard archway

Locations.Name: The Office
Locations.InitialDescription: You are in your office. You spend most of your time here

Locations.Name: The Mausoleum
Locations.InitialDescription: You are in the Mausoleum. There's a lot of rich dead people here

Locations.Name: West-Side Lot
Locations.InitialDescription: You have entered Graveyard Lot A. It is quiet ... too quiet. Most of the headstones here are simple and crumbling, many unmarked. It feels like this is where the cemetery puts those it wants to forget. A few scattered offerings have long since withered away.
Locations.Description: You are at the west-side lot

Locations.Name: East-Side Lot
Locations.InitialDescription: You have entered Graveyard Lot B.The graves are newer, and many are decorated with trinkets, wreaths, and faded cards. It feels like the dead here haven’t been forgotten, not yet...
Locations.Description: You are at the east-side lot

Locations.Name: Graveyard Grounds
Locations.Description: The brisk air outside makes you feel cold. You are outside on the graveyard grounds
Locations.InitialDescription: You are outside on the graveyard grounds
